events.message: I recently ordered a jacket from your website, but I want to return it because it doesn't fit and I would like a refund.
The customer's issue has been categorized as a refund request based on their message mentioning return and refund.
The case has been assigned to agent Sarah M. for further handling of the refund request.
Hello! Thank you for contacting us. Iâ€™m here to help with your return and refund request for the jacket.
Could you please provide your order number and confirm if the jacket is unused and in the original packaging?
Thanks for your help. My order number is 789456123, and yes, the jacket is brand new and still in its original packaging.
We have initiated your return process and you will receive a prepaid shipping label shortly. Once we get the item, your refund will be processed within 5 business days.
That sounds perfect, thank you! I appreciate the quick response and clear instructions.
The refund case is now resolved. Please use the shipping label emailed to you to return the jacket at your earliest convenience.
Just checking in to confirm you have sent back the jacket and if you need any more assistance with your refund.
Yes, I shipped it yesterday. Thank you very much for following up, I really appreciate it.
Your refund has been completed and the case is now closed. Please reach out anytime if you need further support.
We have sent a satisfaction survey via email to hear about your experience with our return and refund process.
